name: Lasers in a Mirror Box
description:
Made for W3 Game Jam (y18w40)

     -Lasers and Mirrors

This variation of 'Antibug Squad' makes you your own enemy.

See how many lasers you can fire off.

Controls:

     WASD/arrow keys to move

     Left mouse button to fire laser

Assets:

MusicAntti LuodeFontDaniel Linssen
